text: In HubSpot email settings, there is a place to specify the "subscription preferences page". You can specify a page and a template. But the page is derived from a template. What would be the expected behavior if the page is derived from template A but in the settings, I chose template B?

nevermind! I figured it out.
The top part is a template selector even though it says "page".
Then the bottom is just an option to Edit or Preview the selected template.
